title: How to contribute a gif on AskGif.
content:
AskGif is honest to GOD approach to bring little smile on the tense faces. Make sure to play your part in our mission to make people smile. Keep smiling and keep sharing.

You can also contribute to our mission using the given process.

subContents.SubTitle: 1. Register Yourself
subContents.SubContent: The first step in contributing Gif is to Register yourself using your email id.

subContents.SubTitle: 2. After Login
subContents.SubContent:
Once you log in after successful registration, you will find Contribute Link at the top menu.

Using Contribute Link you will be able to contribute your gif.

subContents.SubTitle: 3. Contribution
subContents.SubContent: From the Contribution Page, you can upload the gif and once the gif is uploaded then you will find the text box to enter the tag line for the gif and a submit button.

subContents.SubTitle: 4. Submission
subContents.SubContent: Once the gif is uploaded successfully. you can submit your changes using the submit button.

subContents.SubTitle: 5. Your Submission List
subContents.SubContent: You will find your contribution list under the Contribution link.

subContents.SubTitle: 6. Approved List
subContents.SubContent: Once your gif is approved by the moderator, then you can find your gif in the Approved link and you will also find the gif link which is being uploaded to AskGif.com.

recommendations.title: How to contribute a gif on AskGif.
Humble Beginnings
